name: UIWebView.PaginationMode
desc: The layout of content in the web view, which determines the direction that the pages flow.

items.name: case unpaginated
items.desc: Content appears as one long scrolling view with no distinct pages.

items.name: case leftToRight
items.desc: Content is broken up into pages that flow from left to right.

items.name: case topToBottom
items.desc: Content is broken up into pages that flow from top to bottom.

items.name: case bottomToTop
items.desc: Content is broken up into pages that flow from bottom to top.

items.name: case rightToLeft
items.desc: Content is broken up into pages that flow from right to left.
